workflowInfo.workflowDescription: Display DDF information of the provisioned Db2 system

variable.name: AGEXECID
variable.label: AGEXECID
variable.description: The default ID for executing steps in a provisioning workflow.

variable.name: DSNEXIT
variable.label: DSNEXIT
variable.description: The DSNEXIT variable specifies the name of the library where your DSNZPxxx module, application defaults load module (dsnhdecp), and exit routines are to be placed.

variable.name: DSNLOAD
variable.label: DSNLOAD
variable.description: The DSNLOAD variable specifies the name of the main APF-authorized Db2 load module library.

variable.name: MVSSNAME
variable.label: MVSSNAME
variable.description: The SUBSYSTEM NAME field specifies the z/OS subsystem name for Db2.

step.name: stepJDF
step.title: Display DDF information of the provisioned Db2 system (DSNTIJDF)
step.description: Job DSNTIJDF issues the Db2 DISPLAY DDF command.
step.instructions:
Run job DSNTIJDF to issue the Db2 DISPLAY DDF command. Ensure that the provisioned Db2 system is started before issuing this command.
If it runs successfully, it produces a return code of 0.
